contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|rem|REM}} '''Rem''' or '''REM''' may refer to: *[[Rem (unit)]] or Roentgen equivalent man, a unit of radiation dose equivalent *[[RÃ©m]], a village in Hungary *[[Rem (mythology)]], an Egyptian fish god *[[R.E.M.]], an American rock band *[[R.E.M. (EP)|''R.E.M.'' (EP)]], an EP by Green *''[[REM (Real Estate Magazine)]]'', a Canadian real estate trade journal *[[REM (BASIC)]], an inline comment (REMark) in BASIC and some other computer languages *[[Priscilla Hamby]] or Rem, illustrator and comic book artist *[[Rapid eye movement sleep]] *[[Rare earth metal]] *[[Reflection electron microscope]] *[[Reichserziehungsministerium]] or Reich Ministry of Education in Nazi Germany *[[Resource Extraction Monitoring]] *[[Reticular erythematous mucinosis]], a skin disease *[[Rosicrucian Egyptian Museum]] *Rem, a [[Shinigami (Death Note)#Rem|Shinigami character in ''Death Note'']] *Rem, an android character in ''[[Logan's Run (TV series)|Logan's Run]]'' ==People with the name== *[[Rem Koolhaas]], a Dutch architect *[[Rem Saverem]], a character in ''Trigun'' ==See also== *[[REM Island]], home of 1964 pirate stations Radio and TV Noordzee *''[[REM World]]'', a fantasy/science fiction novel by Rodman Philbrick {{disambiguation}} [[nl:REM]]
